content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Structure Analysis:
- The structure appears to be a bridge-like construction with multiple layers
- Base layer: 4 orange cylindrical pillars with yellow rectangular blocks on top
- Middle layer: Red arched bridge section with 4 green blocks on top
- Top layer: A tower made of green, blue, and yellow curved blocks

Layer count: 4 layers total (including base pillars)
Total blocks needed: ~12 blocks

Block selection and assembly order from bottom up:

{
Step1: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) - rightmost pillar
Step2: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) - second from right
Step3: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) - second from left
Step4: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder) - leftmost pillar
Step5: Move block with index 9 (yellow rectangular block) - right side
Step6: Move block with index 9 (yellow rectangular block) - left side
Step7: Move block with index 1 (red arch section) - rightmost
Step8: Move block with index 2 (red arch section) - middle
Step9: Move block with index 3 (red arch section) - leftmost
Step10: Move block with index 5 (green cube) - place four in a row on red bridge
Step11: Move block with index 7 (green vertical block) - tower base
Step12: Move block with index 4 (blue cube) - tower middle
Step13: Move block with index 12 (yellow curved top) - tower top
}

This assembly sequence will recreate the target structure exactly as shown in the main image, using the blocks as they appear in the dictionary without any rotation.
